hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT CODE_GROUP_ID, CODE_GROUP_NAME, CODE_RATE_D_ID, CODE_RATE_ID, CODE_RATE_NAME, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS END_DATE, NEW_PERCENTAGE, PERCENTAGE, RATE_ACTIVE, RATE_D_ACTIVE, RATE_D_IS_ACTIVE, RATE_IS_ACTIVE, REMARK, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS START_DATE, WIC_CODE FROM WC_QLD_UPDATE_RATES WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO WC_QLD_UPDATE_RATES ( CODE_GROUP_ID, CODE_GROUP_NAME, CODE_RATE_D_ID, CODE_RATE_ID, CODE_RATE_NAME, END_DATE, NEW_PERCENTAGE, PERCENTAGE, RATE_ACTIVE, RATE_D_ACTIVE, RATE_D_IS_ACTIVE, RATE_IS_ACTIVE, REMARK, START_DATE, WIC_CODE ) VALUES ( ${CODE_GROUP_ID}, ${CODE_GROUP_NAME}, ${CODE_RATE_D_ID}, ${CODE_RATE_ID}, ${CODE_RATE_NAME}, ${END_DATE}, ${NEW_PERCENTAGE}, ${PERCENTAGE}, ${RATE_ACTIVE}, ${RATE_D_ACTIVE}, ${RATE_D_IS_ACTIVE}, ${RATE_IS_ACTIVE}, ${REMARK}, ${START_DATE}, ${WIC_CODE} )

UPDATE WC_QLD_UPDATE_RATES SET CODE_GROUP_ID = ${CODE_GROUP_ID}, CODE_GROUP_NAME = ${CODE_GROUP_NAME}, CODE_RATE_D_ID = ${CODE_RATE_D_ID}, CODE_RATE_ID = ${CODE_RATE_ID}, CODE_RATE_NAME = ${CODE_RATE_NAME}, END_DATE = ${END_DATE}, NEW_PERCENTAGE = ${NEW_PERCENTAGE}, PERCENTAGE = ${PERCENTAGE}, RATE_ACTIVE = ${RATE_ACTIVE}, RATE_D_ACTIVE = ${RATE_D_ACTIVE}, RATE_D_IS_ACTIVE = ${RATE_D_IS_ACTIVE}, RATE_IS_ACTIVE = ${RATE_IS_ACTIVE}, REMARK = ${REMARK}, START_DATE = ${START_DATE}, WIC_CODE = ${WIC_CODE} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
